posts.post_content: Wizards are clearly trying to remove the "It can't be regenerated" text from the modern game. And in most cases, it just makes the card cleaner and more elegant. We already have "exile" and "sacrifice" effects for when regeneration shouldn't be possible. And for those complaining: When was the last time you killed something with regeneration with your [Terror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terror) or [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God)?
